name: NewsReach
tag_list: content, online, new-media, multi-channel, social-media, email, website, newsletter, blog, twitter, facebook, b2b, b2c, news, platform, media, online-media, digital-media, news-content
overview:
NewsReach offers multi-channel, word-centric content solutions for large businesses/NGOs/governmental bodies which function in line with the various ways in which people now access information as well as identifying this as that content material sought, linked to and shared.

Leveraging this commercially, informative content of appeal to (a) target audience(s) is linked to a brand/product/service.

Articles are written and placed so as to improve SEO, bridge platforms, increase CTRs, engagement levels, conversion rates and repeat visits, whilst inducing UGC on any or all given new media platform(s) and achieving numerous and variable additional objectives such as brand enhancement.

Tangible, outsourced solutions that support SEO and content professionals at reduced cost, articles are written by industry-specific journalists with access to an extensive news infrastructure that exceeds in-house capabilities; targeted platform- and function- specific optimisation is central to production.

NewsReach is a subdivision of Adfero. A specialist impartial news agency, Adfero is the leading provider of digital and online content in the United Kingdom with a major presence in the US and recent moves into German, Italian and Australian markets. Thousands of organisations of all kinds and sizes constituting its client base, Adfero operates in all sectors and on all new media platforms inclusive of websites, social media networks, blogs, micro-blogs, RSS feeds, digital newsletters, email, forums and mobile, as well as numerous offline platforms.
